recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti. In a bowl, mix eggs and cheese. Cook pancetta until crispy. Combine all with spaghetti and pepper.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.instructions: Cook fettuccine. Cook chicken. In a pan, melt butter, add garlic, cream, and cheese. Combine with pasta and chicken.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.instructions: Stir fry vegetables in oil. Add garlic and ginger. Pour soy sauce and cook until vegetables are tender.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.instructions: Cook beef with seasoning. Serve in tortillas with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
recipes.instructions: Spread sauce on dough. Add cheese and basil. Drizzle with oil. Bake until crust is golden.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
recipes.instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing. Add croutons and cheese.

recipes.name: Pancakes
recipes.instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add milk and eggs. Cook on griddle. Serve with butter and syrup.

recipes.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.instructions: Butter bread. Place cheese between slices. Grill until golden brown.

recipes.name: Tomato Soup
recipes.instructions: Cook tomatoes, onion, and garlic. Blend with broth. Add cream and simmer.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
recipes.instructions: Cook onion, garlic, and ginger. Add chicken and curry powder. Pour coconut milk and simmer.

recipes.name: Beef Stew
recipes.instructions: Brown beef. Add vegetables, broth, and paste. Simmer until tender.

recipes.name: Shrimp Scampi
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta. Sauté garlic in butter. Add shrimp and lemon juice. Combine with pasta and parsley.

recipes.name: Quiche Lorraine
recipes.instructions: Cook bacon. Mix eggs and cream. Pour into crust with bacon and cheese. Bake until set.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.instructions: Cream butter and sugars. Add eggs. Mix in flour and chips. Bake until golden.

recipes.name: Lasagna
recipes.instructions: Layer noodles, sauce, beef, and cheeses. Bake until bubbly.

recipes.name: Greek Salad
recipes.instructions: Chop vegetables. Toss with cheese, olives, and oil.

recipes.name: BBQ Ribs
recipes.instructions: Season ribs. Bake covered. Uncover, add sauce, and bake until tender.

recipes.name: Minestrone Soup
recipes.instructions: Cook vegetables. Add broth and beans. Simmer. Add pasta and cook until tender.

recipes.name: Fish Tacos
recipes.instructions: Cook fish. Serve in tortillas with cabbage, lime, cilantro, and sour cream.

recipes.name: Eggplant Parmesan
recipes.instructions: Bread and fry eggplant. Layer with sauce and cheeses. Bake until bubbly.

recipes.name: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipes.instructions: Cook chicken and vegetables. Add broth and noodles. Simmer until noodles are tender.

recipes.name: Stuffed Peppers
recipes.instructions: Stuff peppers with beef, rice, and sauce. Bake until peppers are tender. Top with cheese.

recipes.name: French Toast
recipes.instructions: Mix eggs, milk, cinnamon, and sugar. Dip bread and cook in butter.

recipes.name: Baked Salmon
recipes.instructions: Season salmon. Bake with lemon and dill until cooked through.

recipes.name: Chili
recipes.instructions: Cook beef and onion. Add beans, tomatoes, and chili powder. Simmer.

recipes.name: Garlic Bread
recipes.instructions: Mix butter and garlic. Spread on bread. Bake until golden. Sprinkle with parsley.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
recipes.instructions: Slice tomatoes and cheese. Layer with basil. Drizzle with oil and vinegar.

recipes.name: Chicken Parmesan
recipes.instructions: Bread and fry chicken. Top with sauce and cheeses. Bake until bubbly.

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.instructions: Cook beef and onion. Add mushrooms and broth. Stir in sour cream. Serve over noodles.

recipes.name: Tuna Salad
recipes.instructions: Mix all ingredients. Serve chilled.

recipes.name: Pasta Primavera
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta. Sauté vegetables. Combine with pasta and cheese.

recipes.name: Chicken Fajitas
recipes.instructions: Cook chicken and vegetables with seasoning. Serve in tortillas.

recipes.name: Apple Pie
recipes.instructions: Fill crust with apples, sugar, and cinnamon. Top with butter and crust. Bake until golden.

recipes.name: Clam Chowder
recipes.instructions: Cook bacon. Add vegetables and clams. Stir in cream and simmer.

recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
recipes.instructions: Cook chicken. Toss lettuce with dressing. Wrap with chicken and cheese in tortillas.

recipes.name: Banana Bread
recipes.instructions: Mix all ingredients. Pour into loaf pan. Bake until a toothpick comes out clean.

recipes.name: Chicken Pot Pie
recipes.instructions: Cook chicken and vegetables. Mix with cream. Fill crust and bake until golden.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.instructions: Cook beef with seasoning. Serve in tortillas with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

recipes.name: Vegetable Soup
recipes.instructions: Cook vegetables in broth until tender.

recipes.name: Chicken Quesadilla
recipes.instructions: Cook chicken and vegetables. Fill tortillas with chicken, vegetables, and cheese. Cook until golden.

recipes.name: Pumpkin Pie
recipes.instructions: Mix filling ingredients. Pour into crust. Bake until set.

recipes.name: Chicken Fried Rice
recipes.instructions: Cook chicken and vegetables. Add rice and soy sauce. Stir in egg.

recipes.name: Lemon Bars
recipes.instructions: Mix crust ingredients and bake. Mix filling and pour over crust. Bake until set.

recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Cook with tomato sauce and cream.

recipes.name: Blueberry Muffins
recipes.instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add wet ingredients. Fold in blueberries. Bake until golden.

recipes.name: Chicken Enchiladas
recipes.instructions: Fill tortillas with chicken and cheese. Top with sauce and more cheese. Bake until bubbly.

recipes.name: Beef Bourguignon
recipes.instructions: Cook bacon. Brown beef. Add vegetables and wine. Simmer until tender.
